text:
Report of what we got up to at the R Dev Day @ SIP 2024 (Newcastle, UK): <https://www.jumpingrivers.com/blog/r-dev-day-2024/>. The registration is open already for R Dev Day @ SIP 2025, with a 20% discount on Shiny in Production 2025 tickets - super early bird pricing lasts till Monday 6 January!

Even though I don't do any Shiny development right now, there was lots of interest in the conference programme this year, so I can recommend it as a conference to consider for 2025 - see the <https://www.jumpingrivers.com/blog/shiny-in-production-highlights-2024/|highlights post> on the Jumping Rivers blog to see if it's for you :grin:

attachments.text: R Dev Day @ SIP 2024 This year Shiny in Production hosted an “R Dev Day” split over the two days before the pre-conference workshops. R Dev Days are a new initiative of the R Contribution Working Group, providing an opportunity for R developers to get involved in contributing to the R Project. R Dev Day will be back at SIP 2025, so read on to find out what participants got up to and consider coming along next year!
attachments.title: R Dev Day @ SIP 2024
